mapper.select: SELECT team, teamID, ownerId, brandManager, months, years, specialDispatch, planName, planID, planInvoiceStatus, approvalDate FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT '' AS team, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AS teamID, DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP AS ownerId, USR.NAME_USR as brandManager, #{month} as months, #{year} as years, 1 as specialDispatch, DIP.REMARKS_DIP as planName, DIP.ID_DIP as planID, SLV.NAME_SLV as planInvoiceStatus, MAX(API.UPDATED_ON_API) as approvalDate FROM DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP JOIN APPROVAL_CHAIN_TRANSACTION_API API ON DIP.ID_DIP = API.ID_OWNER_API AND API.ID_STATUS_SLV_API = 'BF12B5B5-2923-4A6F-BE33-27B417D5158E' JOIN USER_MASTER_USR USR ON USR.ID_USR = DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON DIP.ID_INVOICE_STATUS_SLV_DIP = SLV.ID_SLV join DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID did on did.ID_DIP_DID=dip.ID_DIP WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{dispatchType} and DIP.IS_VIRTUAL_DIP=1 and DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024' GROUP BY DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP,USR.NAME_USR,DIP.ID_DIP,DIP.REMARKS_DIP,SLV.NAME_SLV) AS TEMP1 ORDER BY ApprovalDate DESC

SELECT team, teamID, ownerId, brandManager, months, years, specialDispatch, planName, planID, planInvoiceStatus, approvalDate FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT '' AS team, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AS teamID, DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP AS ownerId, USR.NAME_USR as brandManager, #{month} as months, #{year} as years, #{dispatchType} as specialDispatch, DIP.REMARKS_DIP as planName, DIP.ID_DIP as planID, SLV.NAME_SLV as planInvoiceStatus, MAX(API.UPDATED_ON_API) as approvalDate FROM DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP JOIN APPROVAL_CHAIN_TRANSACTION_API API ON DIP.ID_DIP = API.ID_OWNER_API AND API.ID_STATUS_SLV_API = 'BF12B5B5-2923-4A6F-BE33-27B417D5158E' JOIN USER_MASTER_USR USR ON USR.ID_USR = DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON DIP.ID_INVOICE_STATUS_SLV_DIP = SLV.ID_SLV WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{dispatchType} and DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024' GROUP BY DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP,USR.NAME_USR,DIP.ID_DIP,DIP.REMARKS_DIP,SLV.NAME_SLV) AS TEMP1 ORDER BY ApprovalDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT TEM.NAME_TEM AS team, TEM.ID_TEM AS teamID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AS ownerId, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as brandManager, #{month} as months, #{year} as years, #{dispatchType} as specialDispatch, '' as planName, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as planID, '' as planInvoiceStatus, null as approvalDate FROM DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON DID.ID_RCT_DID = RCT.ID_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON RCT.ID_TEM_RCT = TEM.ID_TEM JOIN USER_MASTER_USR USR on USR.ID_USR = DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{dispatchType} order by Team

SELECT DISTINCT TEM.ID_TEM as idTEM, TEM.NAME_TEM as nameTEM, USR.ID_USR as idBM, USR.NAME_USR as nameBM, DIP.ID_DIP as idDip, DIP.REMARKS_DIP as planName, DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP as isSpecialDip, DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP as idPlanStatus, DIP.APPROVAL_DATE_DIP as approvalDate, SLV.NAME_SLV as planStatus, TEMINVSTATUS.ActualStatus as teamStatus, TEMINVSTATUS.InvoiceStatus as idInvoiceStatus FROM DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID JOIN USER_MASTER_USR USR ON DIP.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP = USR.ID_USR JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON DID.ID_RCT_DID = RCT.ID_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON RCT.ID_TEM_RCT = TEM.ID_TEM JOIN (SELECT TEM.ID_TEM 'TeamID',MIN(DID.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID) 'TempStatus', COUNT(DISTINCT DID.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID) 'StatusCount', CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DID.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID) > 1 THEN 'Partial Invoiced' ELSE(CASE WHEN MIN(DID.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID ) = '986F1D6B-AF4B-4E80-AB09-9EC4F0CCDBE7' THEN 'Not Initiated' ELSE 'Fully Invoiced' END) END 'ActualStatus', CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DID.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID) > 1 THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000026' ELSE(CASE WHEN MIN(DID.ID_STATUS_SLV_DID) = '986F1D6B-AF4B-4E80-AB09-9EC4F0CCDBE7' THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000026' ELSE '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000027' END) END 'InvoiceStatus' FROM DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DID.ID_DIP_DID = DIP.ID_DIP JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON DID.ID_RCT_DID = RCT.ID_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON RCT.ID_TEM_RCT = TEM.ID_TEM WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{isSpecial} GROUP BY TEM.ID_TEM) TEMINVSTATUS ON TEM.ID_TEM = TEMINVSTATUS.TeamID JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = SLV.ID_SLV WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{isSpecial} ORDER BY TEM.NAME_TEM,USR.NAME_USR

SELECT DISTINCT RCT.NAME_RCT AS 'employeeName',RCT.ID_RCT AS 'employeeID',RCT.CODE_RCT AS 'code', '' AS 'invoiceNumber','' AS 'groupInvoiceNumber', (SELECT ID_SLV FROM SYSTEM_LOV_SLV WHERE ID_SLV = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000026') AS 'invoiceStatusID', 'Draft' AS 'invoiceStatus', 0 AS 'boxes', CONVERT(FLOAT,0) AS 'weight','' AS 'lrNumber', RCT.STATE_RCT as 'state',RCT.CITY_RCT 'city',DIP.MONTH_DIP AS 'month', DIP.YEAR_DIP as 'year', DES.NAME_ULV as 'designation',DIP.ID_DIP as 'planId', CASE WHEN DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP=0 THEN 'MONTHLY' ELSE 'SPECIAL' END AS 'plan' FROM DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON DID.ID_RCT_DID = RCT.ID_RCT inner JOIN USER_LOV_ULV DES ON DES.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT left join INVOICE_DETAIL_IND ind on ind.ID_DID_IND = did.ID_DID WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DID.ID_RCT_DID IN (SELECT ID_RCT FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT WHERE ID_TEM_RCT = #{teamId}) AND DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = #{status} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{isSpecialDisp} and IND.ID_IND is NULL and RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT= '80BC3490-9F53-4C92-8DBA-3D5C7755FD73'

SELECT DISTINCT INH.ID_INH AS 'invoiceHeaderID', RCT.NAME_RCT AS 'employeeName',RCT.ID_RCT AS 'employeeID', RCT.CODE_RCT AS 'code',CONVERT(NVARCHAR(255), INH.INVOICE_NO_INH) AS 'invoiceNumber', CASE WHEN INH.IDREDIRECTEDINH_INH IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (SELECT INVOICE_NO_INH FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH1 WHERE INH1.ID_INH = INH.IDREDIRECTEDINH_INH) END 'redirectedTo', (SELECT INH2.INVOICE_NO_INH FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH2 WHERE INH2.IDREDIRECTEDINH_INH = INH.ID_INH) 'redirectedFrom', CONVERT(NVARCHAR(255),INH.GROUP_INVOICE_NO_INH) AS 'groupInvoiceNumber',SLV.ID_SLV 'invoiceStatusID', SLV.NAME_SLV AS 'invoiceStatus',INH.NO_OF_BOXES_INH AS 'boxes', INH.WEIGHT_INH AS 'weight',INH.ID_TRN_INH AS 'transporterID',INH.LR_NUMBER_INH AS 'lrNumber', INH.ADDRESS_STATE_INH as 'state', INH.ADDRESS_CITY_INH 'city',DIP.MONTH_DIP AS 'month', DIP.YEAR_DIP as 'year', DES.NAME_ULV as 'designation', TEM.NAME_TEM as 'teamName' FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH INNER JOIN INVOICE_DISPATCH_PLAN_IDP IDP ON INH.ID_INH = IDP.ID_INH_IDP INNER JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = IDP.ID_PLAN_IDP --JOIN INVOICE_DETAIL_IND IND ON INH.ID_INH = IND.ID_INH_IND JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON INH.ID_RCT_INH = RCT.ID_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON INH.ID_TEM_INH = TEM.ID_TEM JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON INH.ID_STATUS_SLV_INH = SLV.ID_SLV join USER_LOV_ULV DES ON DES.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT WHERE DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND (#{teamId} = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' or TEM.ID_TEM = #{teamId}) AND INH.ID_STATUS_SLV_INH = #{status} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{isSpecialDisp}
{call PROC_GetGroupingInvoiceForHUB(#{FromDate, jdbcType = DATE, mode = IN}, #{ToDate, jdbcType = DATE, mode = IN}, #{InvoiceNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN})}
{call PROC_GetInvoicesForGrouping(#{FromDate, jdbcType = DATE, mode = IN}, #{ToDate, jdbcType = DATE, mode = IN}, #{InvoiceNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN})}

select idDip, isSpecialDip,idStatusDip,nameStatusDip,namePlan, idBmRec,nameBmRec,invoiceStatus,convert(varchar(10),ApprovalDate,103) 'approvalDate' from ( select * from( select ID_DIP 'idDip', IS_SPECIAL_DIP 'isSpecialDip',dip.id_status_slv_dip 'idStatusDip', lov.NAME_SLV 'nameStatusDip',dip.REMARKS_DIP 'namePlan', dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP 'idBmRec', USR.NAME_USR 'nameBmRec',SLV.NAME_SLV 'invoiceStatus',max(api.UPDATED_ON_API) 'approvalDate' from DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP dip inner join USER_MASTER_USR USR on dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP = usr.ID_USR inner join SYSTEM_LOV_SLV lov on lov.ID_SLV = dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP INNER JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON DIP.ID_INVOICE_STATUS_SLV_DIP = SLV.ID_SLV inner join APPROVAL_CHAIN_TRANSACTION_API api on dip.ID_DIP = api.ID_OWNER_API and api.ID_STATUS_SLV_API = 'BF12B5B5-2923-4A6F-BE33-27B417D5158E' where dip.MONTH_DIP = #{month} and dip.YEAR_DIP = #{year} and dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP =1 and dip.IS_VIRTUAL_DIP !=1 and dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024' GROUP BY ID_DIP,IS_SPECIAL_DIP,dip.id_status_slv_dip,lov.NAME_SLV,dip.REMARKS_DIP, dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP,USR.NAME_USR,SLV.NAME_SLV ) as Temp1 union select * from( select ID_DIP 'idDip', IS_SPECIAL_DIP 'isSpecialDip',dip.id_status_slv_dip 'idStatusDip', lov.NAME_SLV 'nameStatusDip',dip.REMARKS_DIP 'namePlan', dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP 'idBmRec', USR.NAME_USR 'nameBmRec',SLV.NAME_SLV 'invoiceStatus',max(api.UPDATED_ON_API) 'approvalDate' from DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP dip inner join USER_MASTER_USR USR on dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP = usr.ID_USR inner join SYSTEM_LOV_SLV lov on lov.ID_SLV = dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP INNER JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON DIP.ID_INVOICE_STATUS_SLV_DIP = SLV.ID_SLV inner join APPROVAL_CHAIN_TRANSACTION_API api on dip.ID_DIP = api.ID_OWNER_API and api.ID_STATUS_SLV_API = 'BF12B5B5-2923-4A6F-BE33-27B417D5158E' where dip.MONTH_DIP = month(dateadd(MONTH, -1,convert(datetime, (concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01'))))) and dip.YEAR_DIP = year(dateadd(month, -1,convert(datetime, (concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01'))))) and dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP =1 and dip.IS_VIRTUAL_DIP !=1 and dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024' and slv.ID_SLV != 'F8CDB30B-E49B-48EE-BB59-4005B5B4A0FE' GROUP BY ID_DIP,IS_SPECIAL_DIP,dip.id_status_slv_dip,lov.NAME_SLV,dip.REMARKS_DIP, dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP,USR.NAME_USR,SLV.NAME_SLV ) as Temp3 ) temp2 order by approvalDate desc

SELECT DISTINCT RCT.NAME_RCT AS 'employeeName',RCT.ID_RCT AS 'employeeId',RCT.CODE_RCT AS 'code', '' AS 'invoiceNumber','' AS 'groupInvoiceNumber', (SELECT ID_SLV FROM SYSTEM_LOV_SLV WHERE ID_SLV = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000026') AS 'invoiceStatusID','Draft' AS 'invoiceStatus', 0 AS 'boxes', CONVERT(FLOAT,0) AS 'weight','' AS 'lrNumber', DIP.REMARKS_DIP as 'planName', RCT.STATE_RCT as 'state',RCT.CITY_RCT 'city', DIP.MONTH_DIP as 'month', DIP.YEAR_DIP as 'year', DES.NAME_ULV as 'designation', RCT.STATE_RCT as 'state', DIP.ID_DIP as 'planId', CASE WHEN DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP=0 THEN 'MONTHLY' ELSE 'SPECIAL' END AS 'plan', dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP AS 'PlanOwner' FROM DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON DID.ID_RCT_DID = RCT.ID_RCT inner JOIN USER_LOV_ULV DES ON DES.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT left join INVOICE_DETAIL_IND ind on ind.ID_DID_IND = did.ID_DID WHERE DIP.ID_DIP = #{planId} AND DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = #{status} --AND DIP.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024' and IND.ID_IND is NULL and RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT= '80BC3490-9F53-4C92-8DBA-3D5C7755FD73'

SELECT DISTINCT INH.ID_INH AS 'invoiceHeaderID',TEM.NAME_TEM 'teamName',RCT.NAME_RCT AS 'employeeName',RCT.ID_RCT AS 'employeeId', RCT.CODE_RCT AS 'code',INH.ADDRESS_STATE_INH 'state',INH.ADDRESS_CITY_INH 'city',CONVERT(NVARCHAR(255), INH.INVOICE_NO_INH) AS 'invoiceNumber', CASE WHEN INH.IDREDIRECTEDINH_INH IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (SELECT INVOICE_NO_INH FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH1 WHERE INH1.ID_INH = INH.IDREDIRECTEDINH_INH) END 'redirectedTo', (SELECT INH2.INVOICE_NO_INH FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH2 WHERE INH2.IDREDIRECTEDINH_INH = INH.ID_INH) 'redirectedFrom', CONVERT(NVARCHAR(255), INH.GROUP_INVOICE_NO_INH) AS 'groupInvoiceNumber',SLV.ID_SLV 'invoiceStatusID', SLV.NAME_SLV AS 'invoiceStatus',INH.NO_OF_BOXES_INH AS 'boxes', INH.WEIGHT_INH AS 'weight',INH.ID_TRN_INH AS 'transporterID',INH.LR_NUMBER_INH AS 'lrNumber' FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH INNER JOIN INVOICE_DISPATCH_PLAN_IDP IDP ON INH.ID_INH = IDP.ID_INH_IDP INNER JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = IDP.ID_PLAN_IDP JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON INH.ID_RCT_INH = RCT.ID_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON RCT.ID_TEM_RCT = TEM.ID_TEM JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON INH.ID_STATUS_SLV_INH = SLV.ID_SLV WHERE DIP.ID_DIP = #{planId} AND INH.ID_STATUS_SLV_INH = #{status}

select idDip, isSpecialDip,idStatusDip,nameStatusDip,namePlan, idBmRec,nameBmRec,invoiceStatus,convert(varchar(10),ApprovalDate,103) 'approvalDate' from ( select * from( select idDip, isSpecialDip,dip.id_status_slv_dip idStatusDip, lov.NAME_SLV nameStatusDip,dip.REMARKS_DIP namePlan, dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP idBmRec, USR.NAME_USR nameBmRec,SLV.NAME_SLV 'invoiceStatus',max(api.UPDATED_ON_API) 'approvalDate' from DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP dip inner join DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID did on did.ID_DIP_DID=dip.ID_DIP inner join USER_MASTER_USR USR on dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP = usr.ID_USR inner join SYSTEM_LOV_SLV lov on lov.ID_SLV = dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP INNER JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON DIP.ID_INVOICE_STATUS_SLV_DIP = SLV.ID_SLV inner join APPROVAL_CHAIN_TRANSACTION_API api on dip.ID_DIP = api.ID_OWNER_API and api.ID_STATUS_SLV_API = 'BF12B5B5-2923-4A6F-BE33-27B417D5158E' where dip.MONTH_DIP = #{month} and dip.YEAR_DIP = #{year} and dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP =1 and IS_VIRTUAL_DIP=1 and dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024' GROUP BY ID_DIP,IS_SPECIAL_DIP,dip.id_status_slv_dip,lov.NAME_SLV,dip.REMARKS_DIP, dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP,USR.NAME_USR,SLV.NAME_SLV ) as Temp1 union select * from( select idDip, isSpecialDip,dip.id_status_slv_dip idStatusDip, lov.NAME_SLV nameStatusDip,dip.REMARKS_DIP namePlan, dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP idBmRec, USR.NAME_USR nameBmRec,SLV.NAME_SLV 'invoiceStatus',max(api.UPDATED_ON_API) 'approvalDate' from DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP dip inner join DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID did on did.ID_DIP_DID=dip.ID_DIP inner join USER_MASTER_USR USR on dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP = usr.ID_USR inner join SYSTEM_LOV_SLV lov on lov.ID_SLV = dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP INNER JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON DIP.ID_INVOICE_STATUS_SLV_DIP = SLV.ID_SLV inner join APPROVAL_CHAIN_TRANSACTION_API api on dip.ID_DIP = api.ID_OWNER_API and api.ID_STATUS_SLV_API = 'BF12B5B5-2923-4A6F-BE33-27B417D5158E' where dip.MONTH_DIP = month(dateadd(MONTH, -1,convert(datetime, (concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01'))))) and dip.YEAR_DIP = year(dateadd(month, -1,convert(datetime, (concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01'))))) and dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP =1 and IS_VIRTUAL_DIP=1 and dip.ID_STATUS_SLV_DIP = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000024'
GROUP BY ID_DIP,IS_SPECIAL_DIP,dip.id_status_slv_dip,lov.NAME_SLV,dip.REMARKS_DIP, dip.ID_OWNER_USR_DIP,USR.NAME_USR,SLV.NAME_SLV ) as Temp3 ) temp2 order by approvalDate desc
{ call PROC_GET_PICKLIST ( #{TEAM_ID, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}, #{MONTH, jdbcType = INTEGER , mode = IN}, #{YEAR, jdbcType = INTEGER , mode = IN}, #{Special, jdbcType = INTEGER , mode = IN}) }

{ call PROC_GET_PICKLISTFORVIRTUL ( #{TEAM_ID, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}, #{MONTH, jdbcType = INTEGER , mode = IN}, #{YEAR, jdbcType = INTEGER , mode = IN}, #{Special, jdbcType = INTEGER , mode = IN}) }
{ call PROC_GetGeneratedInvoiceDetails(#{InvoiceHeaderID, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN} )}
